scripts.setversion: npm run setversion:sdk && npm run setversion:stream
scripts.version: npm run setversion && git add sdk/package.json stream/package.json sdk/package-lock.json stream/package-lock.json && npm run publish
scripts.postversion: git push --no-verify && git push --tags --no-verify && git push --no-verify
scripts.publish: npm run publish:sdk && npm run publish:stream
